childElements.name: CertifiedReporterPaymentOverviewNote
childElements.propertySetConfig:
{ "controlWidth" : 12, "label" : "TextBlock5", "text" : "
As outlined in ACJA § 7-206(K)(3), certified reporters have two options for paying their biennial renewal fees:

Option 1: Pay in Full (Biennial Payment)

  • When to Pay: Between January 1 and January 31 of each even-numbered year.
  • Amount: $700.00 (biennial renewal fee).
  • Late Payment:
    • Payments made between February 1 and February 28 will incur a late renewal fee of $100.00.
    • Total due if late: $800.00.

Option 2: Split Payment (Annual Payment)

  • When to Pay:
    • First half due January 1–31 each year.
    • Second half due the following year in the same window.
  • Amount: $350.00 per year..
  • Late Payment:
    • Payments made between February 1 and February 28 will incur a late renewal fee of $100.00.
    • Total due if late: $450.00.

 

", "show" : null, "dataJSON" : false, "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "textKey" : "", "sanitize" : false }
